column3: wiI7pd

Ordered tacos, half way through found a dead lady bug in one and a dead fly in another. Shows they don‚Äôt wash their lettuce properly nor maintain cleanliness. The health inspector needs to pay them a visit

I was probably the first customer of the day and  the service was great (calm, professional, and patient) and the food tastes delicious. As a person who has been a server, I know how hard it is to be 100% setup when you unlock the door-- very impressive!

Place was a mess. I almost took a pic of the bathroom but that would've been unnecessary seeing as how almost every recent review of this place is a 1 or 2 star. Firstly, the guy who made my food the first time I went consistently put more ‚Ä¶

This might be the worst chipotle to exist. I‚Äôve never experienced a friendly worker when going inside. Delivery? Forget about it. Your order will be entirely wrong. It‚Äôs apparently too difficult to simply read a receipt and give someone ‚Ä¶

My family had worst experience at this Chipotle location. Staff is not friendly at all. My toddler want to use rest room on urgent basis & they already closed the rest rooms one hour before the store closing time. They don‚Äôt have any ‚Ä¶

We have been coming to this location since it was opened.  In the last few months, and you can see from other recent reviews that not only the service has become nonexistent, the portion of the food also shrunk.  The last two visits, our ‚Ä¶

Food looks good but I got the smallest potion from any chipotle ever. I actually couldn‚Äôt believe it, the girl serving meat gave me maybe 5 pieces of chicken total. Going to a different location next time
Service was fast and the chicken was good but that was about it. Chips were burned/over cooked, lettuce was on the warm side and didn‚Äôt look the best. Could have been a lot better.

Good transportation and food. The customer service was terrible. I was standing line and I did not get any service. So I stand in the pick up line and the worker finally saw me when two other customers came in. ‚Ä¶

AGAIN the fajita vegetables are so overcooked they are totally mush! Also I get attitude from the servers whenever I ask for them to please drain the beans and vegetables before putting them into my bowl. It's supposed to be a burrito bowl ‚Ä¶

Understand staffs may have been stretched, but compromising how you serve and handle food is unacceptable. We bought 2 burritos and both are so badly done, before we even pick the food it was leaking, things were out and we could hardly eat ‚Ä¶
This company is suing sweetgreen for using the spice Chipotle in its new bowl. Literally never eating here again. Your food isn‚Äôt even healthy! Greedy corrupt corporation.

First time trying Chipotle and I see what all the uproar is about! I had the bowl with white pinto bean chicken and steak fajita vegetables fresh tomatoe salsa sour cream and cheese everything blended together perfect freash and the meat ‚Ä¶
Never had the greatest experiences with thus location. I frequent Chipotle often and this might be the worst location on average I've visited. ‚Ä¶

It was 9:30pm. They close at 10pm. Restroom is unavailable already. I‚Äôm pregnant and cannot hold it (considering that I live in suburbs). Still no way I could use that restroom.
Thanks a lot üëçüèº ‚Ä¶
BATHROOM CODE IS 2580 - REFUSED TO GIVE ME WATER CUP WITH BURRITO
Always out of ingredients and staff is nonchalant and manager Lorena refused a refund for my order then offers chips (that are always stake) for an order that I decided I did not want.

Pretty sad they gave me brown lettuce in my Burrito bowl. Lettuce isnt even exspensive. I'm done with this place. Never again. Too many Complaints from this chain. Close the doors in all the ones in Chicago. Terrible presentation. Who wants brown slimy lettuce through out their Burrito bowl
It gets a little crowded. But the food is good.
This is my fave chipotle downtown. Nice ppl and know my order which is nice!!
It's always been very fast even when the line is long.
Truly the worst chipotle in existence. They are SO skimpy on literally every ingredient (if they even have all the ingredients there, which they usually don‚Äôt). ‚Ä¶
Patricia was a doll!! Thank you for being so kind and patient, not only with me but all the guests in front of me as well. You guys have the right person working the front ‚ú®

Your typical Chipotle with great food that you will love. It does get busy during the week and the seating is pretty limited. Also the past two times I've been in here I have almost slipped on the floor due to rain or snow. They should put ‚Ä¶
This is the ideal chipotle. They hook it up and aren‚Äôt busy and they always have everything, unlike most chipotles. Workers are the best!!

This location is a mess. Online orders are frequently late and/or incorrect. Multiple reviews here mention seeing roaches. They have a contactless pickup shelf for the many takeout orders they get but they almost never use it, so all the ‚Ä¶
This is the worst chipotle I‚Äôve ever been to hands down. Management is non-existent here. 5th time in a row without chips and waiting on cooked chicken.

The lady in front of me complained that her rice wasn't done. She had to have them remake it. They never swapped out the old nasty rice and we're going to continue to serve it to future customers.  Apparently they have a homeless problem ‚Ä¶

We love Mexican and walked by this spot on Michigan Avenue a number of times. It was a deceptively small window-front and you could see people sitting on stools at the little "bar" eating their food while looking out at you on the sidewalk. ‚Ä¶

All burrito bowls were wrong when I ordered online to pickup. The burrito bowls also had very very little amount of lettuce, there was also way too many beans and not enough meat. It was still good, just not how I wanted it because there ‚Ä¶

No problem with the place for grabbing a quick lunch, but today I noticed just how absolutely tastless the burrito was. When got to the gristle taste I actually knew it had steak. No tomato, sour cream, veggies taste at all. I did taste the pop though.

My usual chipotle spot. I decided to stop by for a delicious bowl after school today. As I slowly opened the doors to the mediocre sometimes delicious Mexican chain, I was appalled at the sight of an employee filling up the cheese container ‚Ä¶

I have had a handful of normal meals at this Chipotle location. Unfortunately today, I made an online order, and the "burrito" that was made for my order was not only completely wrong, but so covered in sour cream (that I did not order), that it was closer to a soup than a burrito.

Let me start by saying Chipotle is my favorite fast food chain and I've had hundreds of bowls within the last few years. This location though is very disappointing. I've ate here 3 times and each time the bowls were tasteless, rice was dry ‚Ä¶

Good vibe and helpful staff! I went in to grab an order and deliver it to a customer on my bike. They got my order made exactly how the customer wanted it (and specifically drained the mild salsa for me before it leaked all over the inside of my bag). They got through the line quickly too, which is major points from me!

The employees need to be trained on proper sanitation they wear gloves but do a lot of touching other things besides food with gloves like pulling up their mask over their nose when customers comes in...why is it down to begin with? She was ‚Ä¶

If you've been to Chipotle, you know what you're getting. This location is a busy, popular spot and the quality has never disappointed. The staff are friendly and helpful. It can get quite crowded during lunch, but the line moves well enough. Convenient if you're in River North or catching the Red Line.

My and husband and I were regulars here . Every day I‚Äôd get a steak bowl , until one of their employees Tamara Chandler informed us of their pest problem. She told us they have mice and roaches. We haven‚Äôt been back since . I have strong suggest you don‚Äôt here until they get it under control.

If you love burritos you'll love Chipotle.  It has been popping up everywhere in the last few years.  This location has extremely quick service, and since you watch them put together your burrito - it can't be screwed up!  I get a chicken burrito 9/10 times.

ü§†üçΩÔ∏è               üåüüåüüåüüåü+
The facility was very clean, the food was fresh, the staff was very friendly and professional. Nice location, close to the subway at Grand and State. the ‚Ä¶
I ordered online to pick up at the restaurant. The meal was ready right on time which was nice. But it tastes like it's 2 days old. The rice is HARD and it does not taste warm. I am very unhappy.
Rude service,Bad food , Purposely give smaller portions to make people pay double Won‚Äôt give bathroom service code if you wait in line until you pay smh

Place was clean. Service was fast and polite. Great food although since it was downtown they did charge an extra dollar more to the menu for example rather than the veggie being $6.50 it was $7.50 which I thought was odd.

Staff is horrible. I come here at least once a week since it‚Äôs close by but I‚Äôm never greeted and they are extremely slow. Even when there is no line, staff members are usually checking their phone and gossiping with each other while I was ‚Ä¶

Horrible experience. I placed an online order, wasnt ready when I arrived...took 13 minutes after it was supposed to be ready before I even got my order which was sloppy as ever. I threw it away because the burrito was a mess. Employees were not very inviting. I don't recommend this location

This location was unclean. As soon as i walked in I was greeted with a nasty prep area, the griller worked on top of a nasty prep area and 4 people  passed by it and never cleaned it. I spoke to two managers about it and they stated they ‚Ä¶

I tried to order within Chipotle‚Äôs app twice and both times orders were never delivered! After complaining, Chipotle does nothing to correct the problem nor even try! Qdoba will not be my place to go!

We've been to 2 Chipotles in Chicago on vacation here. Both locations without even having to ask to follow protocol for a gluten allergy have just jumped, fresh bins, separated and completed with a smile. Where we live, that's hard to find ‚Ä¶

I work right near this location. I try to come in often as they make some great food. I ordered a quesadilla today, and the manager comped it because they hadn't seen me for a while! Free food tastes great, but regardless of that, I really enjoy this location and have been enjoying it for years!

This is easily the best Chipotle in Chicago. I work in the area and even though it's always super busy during lunch, my online order is ready when it's supposed to be, and is perfect. This Chipotle is truly the only good thing about working in River North, which is a nightmare hellscape.

Nice and spacious. Beautiful window view and the staff are pretty nice, courteous and professional. The food is good, just need a touch more of salt. Other than that, I really don't have any complaints at all.
It's chipotle, the staff are chill and made you some tasty food what's not to like
Food was fresh but portions .. quarter of a spoon of meat?!! Or of pretty much anything. Beans and rice had no flavor. Scratching this location off the list for sure
I've been here three times for lunch; quick service every time. It's a small spot but never had trouble finding a place to sit. Generous with the sour creme.

I love chipotle in general, this location is great because it's good food for a fantastic price in the middle of the restaurant district of Chicago. NOT impressed with their online ordering... They advertise it like it's a time saver and ‚Ä¶

Ahhhh, Chipotle, we meet again. How I have loved  your chicken burritos for so long. I've recently switched to chicken bowls rather than burritos to save on the carbs. I was afraid I would lose some of the flavor, but none was lost! I love ‚Ä¶

This store has drastically changed within the last two weeks. It's dirty, there are bugs flying out of the plasticware dispenser, and all of the tables have food on them. The last clean table is where some of the staff are randomly hanging out while the few in line are doing the brunt of the work. Never again!
You'll have to wait about 10+ minutes during the lunch rush which is when I go. Other than that generous servings compared to the one by my house. Just need to be able to move customers out faster.

Mexican grill offering quick options like burritos, tacos, burrito bowls, etc. They used to be my favorite 'go to' spot for burritos but now I usually frequent my neighborhood mom and pop Mexican restaurant. Chipotle is okay if you're ‚Ä¶

Mistakenly ordered a burrito instead of a bowl. When i asked if the bowl could be made instead, the cashier proceeded to insult me with expletives. I've never had such an awful experience and I will not be returning.

Chipotle is great.  I never used to eat burritos before a friend introduced me to them here.  Now that ive widened my horizons, ive tried them at lots of places, but chipotle is the only place i keep coming back to.  Its great being able to ‚Ä¶
Loveeeee this Chipotle. The food is amazing and not to mention the staff. Always positive and so helpful! I come everyday and never have a single complain. Highly recommend this restaurant!

This chipotle sucks! Yes, its possible. just threw out all of my food because the guacamole was old and ruined everything. This isnt a first time so i have to say something. Freaking sucks. I spend $10.04 on food i expect it to be somewhat ‚Ä¶

The place if fast if you in a rush, but still gives great service. It is always filling and I recommend the Bowl!! You can't go wrong with getting the chicken. I also recommend the chips with some sour cream.
Saw a cockroach in the dining area while in line and walked out. I see a 7 month old review talking about cockroaches as well. Get your roach problem under control.
Mom and I had delicious tacos, actually she had a chicken bowl without the tortillas. My tacos were yummy!
Worst service ever! Small portions, rude employee, dirty store! Avoid at all costs

Had the smallest portion ever with this Chipotle location. Usually I'm stuffed after a eating a bowl at other locations but not this one. All the tables were unclean. Had to walk around to find a clean table.

I love chipotle, but I went to this new location and was surprised by the really bad customer service. The two girls serving the food looked down on customers, and seemed like they were not enjoying their job, and were taking it all out on the customers. Will not go back to this location.
Don‚Äôt go to this location they will give you half spoon of everything, including your protein which is the worst.  SMH! Very disappointed, I basically paid $21.5 for 2 half burritos üåØüôÑ ‚Ä¶
There were several large pieces of avocado shell in my burrito. See included photo.
What can I say I just love me some Chipotle got to get that half chicken half steak burrito with fajita mix black beans pico de gallo and a red sauce and lettuce. ‚Ä¶
I feel like they're going light on giving you extra ingredients and making the burritos smaller than they used to but it's still really good, fresh food.
Best Chipotle I have ever been too. The staff seems to enjoy their jobs there. The place is very clean. It's definitely my favorite location.
Incredible food nice staff

It's chipotle. What does that mean?  You're going to have a fast delicious tex-mex style meal. You'll leave with a full belly. I'm a big fan of ordering the burrito bowl with tacos on the side (no extra charge).

This Chipotle is very similar to the other's in the franchise, but it's the one closest to my work so I frequent it most often.  The burritos are delicious :)  There is often a line during lunch, so be prepared.
New smoked brisket is the worst. Dry, hard, tasteless pieces of burnt charcoal. Don't try it.
Its chipotle, but it was never busy for marathon weekend and i was in and out without a hiccup.

Service sucks at this location but it is otherwise the same old Chipotle food you will get at any other location.  I recommend going to a real Mexican restaurant if you're already downtown but if you have to have Chipotle, this will do.
Convenient, fast, clean, and great food! Would have loved more seating, and perhaps something a bit more comfortable as a queue area, but otherwise this is a great place to grab a bite anytime!

They use the grass feed cows' meat!  It was recommended  in Food Inc movie!
Very fast you can pickup your food or dine in and the Mexican food choices are delicious.
Like every other River‚Äã North counter service lunch spot, long lines and scarce seating at lunch rush. Otherwise, standard Chipotle conveniently located at the corner of State St. And Grand.

The thing about all chipotles is the servers don't listen and ask the same questions over and over. I don't get it, because this is particular to chipotles only. It's almost as if they're in their own world.
Great location. The staff is super friendly and fast. Really enjoyed it.
I had an awesome time the staff was friendly and nice the bathrooms were clean and sanitized.....great experience will definitely backüëçüëçüëçthe food was scrumptious as always..... ‚Ä¶
I love chipotle, I don't love this location. You basically get a rice burrito. Walk an extra few blocks to the one on Michigan. Much better
Server gave different amounts of meat to different customers, chicken was burnt. Other than that, service was fast and nice.
Been to this location multiple times. Hard, uncooked rice, smaller serving sizes than other locations, and occasional bad service are among the reasons I will never return here.
I don't understand how this restaurant franchise stays open for business. The food nasty and environment preparation area is full of germs/contamination.
Girl that took my order seemed to be annoyed the whole time and didn‚Äôt give me the proper amount of food. I asked for more rice and that seemed to bother her...
Every time I go there the food is looking dry up why can't you stir the food make it presentable I walk out every time and go to Chipotle on state
They need to start hiring people who actually care for their customers. They need to loose their attitudes before walking in for their shift. Makes customers uncomfortable.
If you order a large guacamole with a large bag of chips make sure they don‚Äôt give you a regular bag of chips. They keep making the same mistake.
Their food is wonderful.I love how they mix there foods together. Their service is unbelievable .When you eat their food it gives you that mexican feel about food.

How mych do I lover thee, let me count the ways, love those burrito bowls, steak, yummy goodness in a bowl, thats rocks, you can add the vegiies and cheese and salsa, it never ends, I became addicted to the stuff during pregnancy and it stayed with me
Your average Chipotle. One thing that is annoying is that this place always breaks (when folding it they pop it) my burrito unlike other Chipotles that I visit.
Quick, filling, great food - team is more than happy to help you choose the best dish from their menu

The food at this location is the same as the other chipotle branches, yet I have had repeated occurrences with rude staff and unethical behavior at this location, I reccomend walking to the other downtown locations.
Been here multiple times, usually packed, but when I came in to pick up an online order, there was no one in line, yet took 15 minutes to get someone's attention and my order hadn't been started.
Found four small pieces of bones in my food. Felt severe discomfort while chewing the food. I am a regular customer but this was very bad experience.
The food was good, but my son couldn't get in the bathroom even with the secret code.
Never been to this location, live the Brand and the Food. The location is good for in and out parking for downtown.
First time I had Chipotle, Belgian guy in Chicago, was great, I enjoyed it for like 3 days.
It's clean inside, but compared to other chiptole locations in the city, the staff here are... "Slightly less competent" you could say. Not for folks in a hurry
Chipotle is definitely the best restaurant of its kind in terms of serving fresh, tasty, well-portioned, responsibly sourced food
Five stars for being exactly what you'd expect from any Chipotle. Despite its downtown location, the prices are still the same as anywhere else.
Good food at decent prices. Can get a little noisy around lunch and very busy.
It's alright,  tolerable. If I want real Mexican food I wouldn't eat at Chipotle
It's Chipotle.. Same great food and large portions at a great price.  You know I'll be back
Staff was friendly. Everything was clean. Bathrooms were clean. Food was great! It was good times!
Made fresh daily you can taste the hard work that goes into each meal üòÅ‚ù§üëç ‚Ä¶
Serving & wrapping is little different than what I used have in Toronto, Canada. Overall it is ok.
Waited +8 minutes than scheduled could order in person quicker
I love Chipolte! Food is always fresh. Dont rush the people thru the line tho'.
Don't get the brisket, they give you less than half of a scoop
Great food and great service!  Delivery was early, driver was communicative and courteous!
Usual Chipotle. Frequently the service is very, very slow. Food is just as great as any other Chipotle though.
What's the point of having rewards app to scan off I'm just told that I have to manually enter it from the receipt. #chipotlefail
The store manager literally yelled at me like I was her kid lol üòÇ ‚Ä¶
I love this place for clean eating, I go there for the chicken bowls, delicious!
Worst Chipotle in the City. Super small portion sizes, rude, very unhelpful staff.
Never give enough meat and charge so much for extra but it's good
Food are fresh served but while I'm in queue for order, the sewer pipes are smelling badly.
Line can be a little long at this location but other than that, it's just as great as all other locations.
Fast service. It's ok. They need to add sour cream to their quesadillas.
Ate here twice. Got food poisoning twice. If I could give no stars I would.
Called to place an order to go - at 3pm when I know they're not busy - and they told me to "place the order online". #lazy
It's Chipotle, it's fast and used to be cheap, not anymore
Really good and a good price.   I love the hard shell tacos.   Try them.
Food was good.
About as good as you'd expect from a Chipotle!
Awful food and service. Really just horrible.
Service here is always excellent and I always have a great time seeing Sherie
Move quick, seating is limited but people dont tend to linger
I like chipotle but this location make me fall in love with it.Just perfect :)
It's the same as every other Chipotle, and that's why we love it.
chipotle is absolutely incredibly amazing if you have free burrito coupon.
Didn‚Äôt give me silverware or napkins with online order.
i like going here cuz it a mexican restaurant and im mexican american and it has the burritos i like the burrito bowl i recomended to you.
Gotthe chicken bowl got sick the same night and the manager refunded my meal
They take care of long lines quickly! Staff is upbeat too
Is what it is for a good chain choice. Fresh cooked and staff is as expected.
Best place for an American style burrito with a cheap price! üëåüèª ‚Ä¶
One of the best Mexican food and you can find it everywhere
burritos that make you turn your head too the side are so good.
Missed chipotle a lot! Huge amount of delicious burrito with reasonable price!
They were rude and gave me one million beans when I said no beans.
Love the staff there, their awesome and always so accommodating!!!
Better than the loop one. Much cleaner and spacious.
It's same as indian dish, still needs spicy
Was ok but mild needs to be less spice that is more medium
Great service! They're They're friendly!
Great food with a good price politic :)
quick easy, don't stay hungry grab a burrito on the go!
Prices high but good serivce and food....
Within walking distance if you're shopping on the Mag Mile.
The slowest Chipotle in America no lie
Good food. Nice portions
Best food I have ate in USA....
Super clean. Super fast. Excellent service!
With so many better spots, just go somewhere else.
Awesome and consistent no matter where you are in the US.
Tasty food, co-operative staff.
Fast service. Not the best area after dark.
Friendly staff, clean location... mmmm Chipotle
Serving portions are always generous!
Best tacos for your dollar by far
They know that single meat means double meat.
Normal Chipotle experience, no problems üòÅ ‚Ä¶
Disgraceful serving sizes. Go elsewhere.
Very filling. Good place for a quick bite
Amazing food, fast service
This location literally had me in and out in 4 minutes!
Whoever grills the chicken here sucks ü§Æü§¢ü§Æ ‚Ä¶
Great service during lunchtime.
3 words: Needs better management.
Great Chipotle and super fast service!
I got sick to my stomach with their food
It's really clean and inexpensive

Looks like all new crew... They are not welcoming. Serve cold meat and cold rice. Rush you. Give you half of what you used to get. Forget what you want on your bowl. Used to come here but won't anymore.

I ordered a veggie bowl and just wanted the included free guacamole on the side. I do this through the app fine. I asked in person and they charged me for the guac and acted really rude when I asked for clarification on why I was being charged for guac on a veggie bowl.

Customer Service was TERRIBLE. DO NOT GO HERE. Whoever Is Over the Staff that was there on June 5th @ 6:00 PM. Should do an ENTIRE RESWAP of the staff IMMEDIATELY. That entire staff is going to ruin the revenue coming into your company, i ‚Ä¶

This chipotle is disgusting. They are sloppy and unsanitary. I had to walk out while the girl was fixing my food because she picked up the corn that fell and put it back in my bowl!!! You will have to see the way they operate to believe it. ü§Æü§¢ ‚Ä¶
The worst branch ever. They gave me an order I think doesn't belong to me, the add-ons were different. Additionally, the portion size wasn‚Äôt good enough

I go to chipotle frequently and this time was the worst ever, no joke. Look at the pictures. We had a party and I ordered 4 entrees for 4 people. Party was over really quick. All 4 spent evening sh**ing themselves. The guacamole colour says it all with over burnt meat.

This location did not have many of the ingredients (like beans, white rice, etc) 45 minutes before closing time. It seemed like they closed their kitchen and stopped making food an hour before closing. When telling the employees that they ‚Ä¶

The people that work there are TERRIBLE. I say avoid this place at ALL cost. Hopefully they shut down soon. All the food is spoiled. They don‚Äôt know how to follow directions and it seems the manager don‚Äôt care at all. They just need to put a parking lot there at this point. Also don‚Äôt transfer none of them to another store.

The location is quite convenient. It is just next to the Grand Station Red Line.  Very nice and bright place, cheerful customer service, tried their chicken burrito and the burrito bowl both tastes great! The corn chip was a blast!

Reviewing after multiple poor experiences here. Pick up order is always either cold (even though I arrive early) or flat out wrong. Couldn‚Äôt get over my ‚Äúcheese quesadilla‚Äù today and had to post

I had the nastiest bowl here. The lettuce was old, beans had so much water. I looked like a soup and the sour cream got mixed with the water. The employees were very rude, SHE SAID SHE COULD‚ÄôNT DIDNT WANT TO SELL ME A SINGLE TACO.
Disgusting. My bowl reaked of rotten ingredients before I opened the bag and sure enough rotten dairy odor and nearly black guac. Clearly no care for their patrons.
